website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality stress ball that holds up over a lot of heavy use.
pros: Helps relieve the pain in your hands
Squeezing this ball can really help lower your stress levels
Good as a fidget or anxiety reliever
Also bouncy and can be thrown against a wall
cons: A little smaller than other stress balls

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with my stress
customer_reviews.text: Helps me a lot with my stress which is indirectly saving lives The less stress I have, the less people's faces I mash in
customer_reviews.author: 3xxx

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have stress related hair pulling at night, and constant hair loss daily (thank goodness I'm not balding). After daily use of this squeezing this ball and just holding it, my stress level is significantly lower and near to none hair knots on the floor. Thank you, serenilite!
customer_reviews.author: Charleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help strengthen a weak wrist, which bordering on surgery, and now, no surgery! In just a week of daily usage my wrists are doing much better. Not a miracle cure by any means, but an honest response to careful, considered use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: MikoNoNyte

customer_reviews.title: Good size and texture
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the size and texture of this ball. It's on the smaller side--about the size of a golf ball--which allows you to do so exercises between fingers that you wouldn't be able to do with a larger ball or without much larger fingers! The firmness seems just right as well--not too squishy to be ineffective but also not too hard to facilitate more delicate exercises involving a single finger. Have picked up several of these to be able to leave one in the office, have one at home, have one in the car, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Scharnagl

customer_reviews.title: Thos stress ball could have been the best investment for an item like this
customer_reviews.text: This stress ball could have been the best investment for an item like this! After a while I wanted to order this, because other stress balls that I use are made out of foam and easily rip after extensive use. With this Serenlite Hand Therapy Ball it has a stitching on the outside that is very soft and is very comfortable, but the best part about it is how it actually feels. This Ball is VERY soft and squeezable, I have excessively used this and I practically take it everywhere as it does not damage or dirty up. Great investment to anyone who needs a very good stress reliever and a hand workout ball!
customer_reviews.author: Tominator

customer_reviews.title: Fits Small Hands
customer_reviews.text: This ball fits perfectly in my small hands. Since the fit is ideal, I actually got quick results when I used it. I fell on my hand about three weeks ago and it got bruised up pretty bad. I also lost the ability to grasp. My husband found this on Amazon, ordered it and once I got it, I started using it right away. The day after the first use, I could open my child/proof medicine bottle, my fingers didn’t hurt as bad as before. The soft material makes it a lot more comfortable than those hard plastic balls given out at the physical therapy office. I am really pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, no offensive smell and it's squishy. At first I was disappointed because I thought it was too small but after using it... it's the perfect size. Just for reference, I'm six foot one and I cannot palm a basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief from finger stress, AND great for fidgeting
customer_reviews.text: I came across this ball when trying to figure out why my middle and ring fingers on my right hand were losing strength. I work at a computer all day, so I figured it was related to that, possibly carpel tunnel or something. I ordered this thinking maybe it’ll help. Well I’ve been spending about 5-10 minutes a day with it in my hand, squeezing it and rolling it around, and after two weeks I’ve noticed that I no longer have pain or weakness in those fingers. I’m so happy that such a simple product improved my quality of life!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Martin

customer_reviews.title: "Professional-grade" stress ball!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a school counselor and this little guy sits in my desk and is used nearly every day... either by me or my students. It is well-made and I consider it a "professional" level stress ball! It's not like those cheap "foam" balls that most people associate with stress balls. This could also serve as a very useful hand-strengthening tool. I would happily buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy stressball
customer_reviews.text: A stressball like this is just what i needed to keep myself from being consumed by my stress and snapping at other people. It is a perfect stressball and it feels very nice and soft and squishy. Perfect for anyone who feels stressed by everyday life. Its bouncy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hand therapy
customer_reviews.text: Currently doing exercises for a healing broken finger and this is perfect. Additionally, the company sent an email with additional exercises. I highly recommend this hand therapy stress ball.
customer_reviews.author: maryknits

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for stress relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who was struggling with anger issues and would almost break whatever was in his hands when he thought about troubling issues. He's a big, muscular dude and this ball has really helped him out. He carries it with him everywhere now and uses it to relieve stress by squeezing the crap out of it. Its held up to his attempts to crush it and doesn't show any sign of wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bresie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable.Helped me after by pass surgey.
customer_reviews.text: Used it after bypass surgery. The graft was taken from my left hand/wrist.I did not feel my thumb at all/post op. It was numb and I could not use it as before. I am using this ball for 2 weeks already.There is a Big improvement.I can use my thumb much better and sensation comes back slowly.I reccomend it for people that have numbness in there hands and for taking the stress away as well.Good quality.Do not know how long will it last.
customer_reviews.author: Roma Grey

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: I have pains in finger and knuckle joints, injuried thumb all the time for doing simple jobs and even sometimes for no reason. I do not have arthritis and was tested twice, came back negative. So I start using these stress balls to strengthen my joints/tendonitis and within two days it gave me more relief. This is my fourth day I put two stress balls on one hand and start squeezing. No more pains and my grip got a lot stronger. Planning to get two more balls so I can start squeezing same time with two balls in both hands. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Withstood the Test of Time
customer_reviews.text: My dad, who suffers from Alzheimer's and has very strong hands, has two of them, one for each hand. Although he twists and squeezes them and what have you, the balls have made it without ripping, spilling, or losing shape. Washable. They are covered by some kind of fabric, not plastic. The contents inside are probably rubber, definitely not beans.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, enjoy some weird consistency "stress relief"!
customer_reviews.text: It's a ball. It's fun. Buy some stress relief in the form of a ball to throw against the wall or simply to squeeze. I'm a rock climber, and I find it a little too "gloopy" inside the poly covering for real stress relief or hand therapy. But it's great for catch or to play around with. Don't complain about the little stitching errors, you might break the stitching by pitching it super hard at a wall anyhow. I did with another brand, but this one seems to hold up better. I love this ball, even though it's just another copy of other brands' same version of this ball. Buy the cheapest one you find, they're all nearly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best stress ball I've ever had so far
customer_reviews.text: It really is the perfect amount of firmness and softness. It's not an effort to squeeze it, and not too soft where it's pointless to have. I really like how the size fits perfectly in my hand. I also really appreciate that the ball is not made out of that weird rubbery material that could easily get lint and other gunk on it in no time.
customer_reviews.author: jojtamayo

customer_reviews.title: My hands don't hurt after using the ball.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that the stress ball does not make my hands hurt after using it for a few minutes. I do feel like I am getting back more strength in my hands. The ball is so portable too since it is a perfect size. I purchased one for my husband, and after trying his, I knew that I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Sublime squishiness!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just got here today, so I definitely cannot say anything about how well this will hold up... But it appears to be made very well, so there's that. I can't put it down, though. I was a little disappointed with how small it was initially, but I enjoyed it's squishiness from the first squeeze. I love it's perfect smoosh, and I have probably gotten a solid hour in each hand today with it, just because it's so enjoyable. Perfect for stress, and will probably help hand/wrist strength as well.
customer_reviews.author: LSome

customer_reviews.title: Stress ball that I use for work
customer_reviews.text: This ball is my stress ball at my work. I keep it on my desk when handling challenging phone calls or when I need to stretch my hand through hours of typing. I feel its always important to take a break and also give my hands some flexing. Material is study, i can squeeze hard without worrying itll break.
customer_reviews.author: Midor1tora

customer_reviews.title: Love this stress ball!!
customer_reviews.text: Can already feel a difference from how I am able to squeeze the ball now from when I got them a week ago. I worried because I have very small hands and struggle with the size of most stress balls. No worries here. While it is the perfect size for a large hand, it is still fits in my smaller hand, so I am still able to squeeze it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty in DE

customer_reviews.title: The quality is really good, I truly recommend it for anyone who has ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm in grad school, and my life is full of stress. Since I have this ball I'm not biting my nails and hands, I'm not biting my pens.. and I feel more relaxed and focused. In the second day my hand was just taking the ball and squeezing it while I was working, and as simple as it is, it helps focus, concentration, and long hours of work. The quality is really good, I truly recommend it for anyone who has to work long hours in an office and want to improve relaxation, focus and serenity. Great complement to regular physical exercise :P
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I used this product basically daily to relieve stress and today its developed a tear. Don't get me wrong, this product really did help squeezing it to try to relieve stress and increase hand strength as well. Really did, but this clearly doesn't stand up to the test of time and I am quite disappointed by this. See the picture as proof of what happens with time. I have contacted the company about this and will revise this if they respond and do right. Update: I contacted the company and they do stand by their lifetime warranty. They issued a full refund and due to that will increase this to 4 stars since they do stand by their warranty
customer_reviews.author: A helpful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for strengthening hands, not so much for fidgeting
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great, but it is too stiff for me. I bought it for me to use as a stress reliever/fidget toy and my hand strength is just not good enough to use it for that purpose. It does make my hand hurt over time, so I know this would be great for improving strength in your hands. Maybe I should try that and see if I like it better for fidgeting! It weighs a bit more than I expected but not heavy, but fits nice in your hand and the material is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little ball. I am using it for the melt method as theirs are very expensive compared to this ball. I think it will do the same thing and it is made of an eco friendly material - not PVC like other well priced small balls on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ariel tempest

customer_reviews.title: Love me Some Balls
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these a couple of years ago and a former Co-worker stole it. Anyways I totally forgot the name until I saw them online and presto I got my some ball. I really like this thing and it helps me specially when I have spent so much time on a freaking computer typing or clicking the mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Oneximo Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It appears not only do I have arthritis in my hands but also carpal tunnel in my thumb and index fingers. I was looking for something soft enough to use to try and strengthen my hands but also to help with flexibility. This is too firm for me and actually causes discomfort. I had read reviews prior and thought this was the right choice for me. Unfortunately I was wrong. I will not be using this as I do not want to cause more pain than I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: It really helped with my wrist pain and it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: It really helped with my wrist pain and it comes with a small booklet of exercises that help. I'm only mad that dog stole it from me. I got a red one for my boyfriend and he loves it. I purchased another one for myself after my dog stole my original one. This new one didn't come in a Serenlite box like the first two did and it has poor stitching. I was sent a used ball...
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It has the soft stretchy texture on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It has the soft stretchy texture on the outside that lost stress balls don’t have. Also a gel inside that feels really good to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo hernandez

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described. The stress ball I bought was the color black. There is fabric sewn like a baseball around the squeezable material. When I first got it, the stress ball was a bit hard to squeeze; but after a lot of squeezing of the ball, it became much more pliable. The stress ball has the logo on it twice with serenilite in the color white with a dolphin or fish swimming in a circle with two dots one small and the other a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna E.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up like expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stress ball for my fiancé who works at a stressful desk job and I’m not sure how we did it but he squeezed it so much the fabric came off the gooey ball that’s inside after only a few weeks of having it so it doesn’t last very long. For me I’m sure I would’ve worked great lol I liked it the few times that I was using it but my fiancé definitely tore through it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend that was having some major hand cramping and straining issues in her hand. The first day she used it, she noticed an improvement in not only the pain but also the use of her hand. Now she takes it with her everywhere. I have been planning to get a few more for travel and to leave at work for her, and also one for myself to help prevent the onset of carpel or other issues from being a desk jockey all day.
customer_reviews.author: ECW813

customer_reviews.title: Great For Other Than Just Hand Therapy
customer_reviews.text: This specific brand and style was recommended by my Physical Therapist. Purchased 2 to put in a sock for spinal work, lower back. The PT has used them in her classes and with clients over and over. She buys for quality and durability. They do great for my home program. An easy choice as she only buys top of the line. Her review and recommendation saved me the searching I would have had to do. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Willowisp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that at first it was rather stiff but after a few uses it loosened up and then it kept that new looser firmness which I was perfectly fine with. I've used a couple of different stress balls and when I squeeze them I really go at it. This one was able to take all of it without any signs of getting stretched or the structure being comprised. Fell out of my bag and rolled away but I loved it while it lasted. Tempted to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawid

customer_reviews.title: Good, but quality issues?
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Feels good to squeeze. - Just the right size. - Fun to bounce or throw around. Neutral: - Might be just a little too hard. It does get softer over time. Cons: - Some of the stitching is smooth, but some of it is jagged. - There are bumps around the stitching. - The logo has faded over time.
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say, besides I love it?
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap stress ball for work, and with everything going on I wore it out. This one deserves every once of praise, as it is durable and has a great tactile feel to it, not like one of the cheaper foam ones but I think this is filled with silicone or something as it provides just the right amount of resistance. Absolutely happy that I chose it, and have it in my pocket right now!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received item a few days ago. Using for hand excersise. Too soon to evaluate whether it works for my problem. This is the one to buy if you need an exerciser for your hand. Quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mareena

customer_reviews.title: How can it be so highly rated?
customer_reviews.text: I find it small. After getting it, I went online to check the photos, and I think the size does not come clear in the photos. It's between a golf ball and baseball. Nice material, nice feel, so I give it a 3, but why would it be 4.5 rating? It is not functional, how do you get so far over average? Made in China, so cheap, average product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gross

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, super sturdy- not a typical "slow rise" stress foam ball. The color is super dark "rose" red not really pinky. I use it at my desk on long calls and I give it to my clients when I freelance as a makeup artist so they chill out while I do their makeup. It gets a lot of abuse and has taken it all with no issue. If you're looking for a stress ball, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: KBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Not You Average Office Stress Ball
customer_reviews.text: This stress ball was actually a bit firmer than expected, but on a good way. I was thinking og the cheap foam-like ones you get when you work in a office. I've mostly been using it to exercise my hand. I'm having some issues with pain and weakness and this stress ball is just what I needed. It offers good resistance while not being too firm. I like the feel of it and I love that it came in orange.
customer_reviews.author: Virago

customer_reviews.title: Great stress-relief toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a counselor and have this placed in a basket on my desk for clients to use during sessions. It's a great stress reliever and good exercise for your hand. It has stayed fairly clean and appears to be pretty durable. I chose the orange color which makes it easy to find against other stress toys. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hand stress ball
customer_reviews.text: Family history probs are hitting me. Losing strength in my hands. Gel-like, fits in my palm. Takes away some of the ache. Made very well. Happy w/ purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mother

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It took three weeks of casual use for the cover to come off. A card came with it encouraging people to visit the company on Facebook and the link was a dead end. So much for the lifetime guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Derek S Campau

customer_reviews.title: Best stress ball!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Serenilite stress ball because I always prefer the exterior material that is stitched around the ball. It is a perfect ball for squeezing and not dealing with rubber or vinyl material that can start to feel unpleasant after use. My order was exactly what I wanted and arrived very quickly. I highly recommend Serenilite for both their product and their service.
customer_reviews.author: David Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stress Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best feeling stress ball! I have found many to be too large for my hand or too difficult to comfortably squeeze. This ball is just the right size and has a squishy feel to it that is perfect. I bought a second one to keep at work for when I am feeling stressed or anxious.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: If you want something that kind if stays when you press it - this is not it. Feels like an exercise ball for your hand, it's gel, but hard.
customer_reviews.author: AshWay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant to purchase because of the cost, but I am very glad I did. This stress ball is so much better made than your average ball. I also like that it is softer and does not cramp my hands off. My only challenge is keeping my dogs away from it! I would definitely recommend. Seller did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough for No Complaints (Probably Great)
customer_reviews.text: While I gave this as a Christmas present and have no direct experience with this product, the feedback was positive. Also, the people I gave this to as a gift to are usually very negative and have no compunctions against complaining whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR YOUR HAND AND WRIST!
customer_reviews.text: I am an online business owner and spend 10/12 hours on a computer...for health reasons i take breaks to stretch etc and this ball is great for sitting at my computer alternating hands...I love it!...I love the color...it puts me in a good mood!
customer_reviews.author: Christian M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from anxiety for many years and always fidget with my hands especially at work. This little guy has helped me so much, I literally carry it with me 24/7. I'm going to have to order more because my husband keeps borrowing mine lol.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stress ball. Unfortunately, after less than a week's use, the seam on the ball broke making it in uncomfortable to use. I wish the ball simply withstood stress a bit better. I am not sure if I simply received a defective product or not. I think if the fabric were more durable, it would be a great stress ball. I want another, but I cannot justify spending another $12 to buy another right now.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Caruthers

customer_reviews.title: It helps so much!
customer_reviews.text: I type several hours per day for work. When I take a break, this helps my wrist and fingers tremendously. I have the start of carpal tunnel, and this has been a great big help in such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, it was great, then I lost it. So I bought a second one, and it started coming apart at the seams. Customer service took great care of me and they made sure I am still a happy customer. Just ordered a replacement for the one that was defective. Good company, good product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be well made. I have large hands, so it's a little small for me, but it still works well. I'm going to buy a second one to keep in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McAlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice stress ball for hand exercises
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than some of the others, so good for smaller hands and very good for finger strengthening. Very nice quality - seems durable - and has good tension. Works well for my wife's hand therapy after recovering from a broken wrist bone.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bogert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape and firmness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for strengthening exercises after hand surgery and I love it. It's the perfect size and firmness. It's durable and has no odor unlike others I've seen. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: First stress ball Ive ever bought and its addictive to play with. Everyone i have try it out loves it. My only complaint is its a little on the small side. Weird perk I wasn't expecting - it kinda bounces. Ive definitely pitched it at a wall to see what would happen - would withstand probably hundreds of throws. It is a cube and when squished it flattens like a cube would - edges hold their line, faces bevel out - so good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Super dense but there's days where that's needed
customer_reviews.text: Super dense but there's days where that's needed. The texture isn't calming to me, it's like an athletic shirt. I've beat the dickens out of this poor ball through incessant squishing, and it's starting to show as the wrap sags. These things aside, it's always in my pocket and helps to keep me calm.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore joints
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the stress ball to help me with symptoms of arthritis in my hands and feet. It started to help loosen the muscles and make my joints feel better in only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GC Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Best stress ball ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stress ball was recommended to me by a friend and I don't regret buying it. It's the perfect combo of soft and slightly harder. It smells great, which sounds strange but it's worth mentioning considering most stress balls smell like chemicals. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mew

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want an empty plastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: This item did not show up! I got AN EMPTY BAG!!! Nothing in it! No stress ball. A crumpled bag with a card. It arrived with other items so it WASNT lost in the mail. Some sinister nonsense went down here. I’m BEYOND irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Saxe

customer_reviews.title: Best stress ball ever
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but worth it. Strange to say, but the best stress ball I've ever used. Perfectly balanced, just squishy and just hard enough. Great durable cover too that stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good stress ball
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, good resistance, good material. I bought other stress balls and this is the one I prefer. The material is easy to clean and it does not attract dust like other stress balls.
customer_reviews.author: PKL

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Seam is not stitched. Opening can not use. Please send me one immediately and I’ll return defective one when my label arrives
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The search for the right stress ball is over!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stress ball for my 12 year old who is experiencing anxiety at school. She has been very happy with the feel of it. It softens the more you use it. We had been searching for a while to find the right stress ball.
customer_reviews.author: Whittni Grubaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Trying to rehab my writing hand from ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! Great product! Trying to rehab my writing hand from what might be carpal tunnel and this is a HUGE help!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Great size,
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to strengthen my hand. Came when they said it would, color was right on. Gives my hand a workout. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great product
customer_reviews.text: Great service and great product!! Well made and very convenient for strengthening and stretching fingers as well as therapeutic for relieving stress! Works well as a massager for neck. Very happy with the product and have bought several to have at home, in car and at the office. Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Feaver

customer_reviews.title: Treats tennis elbow, strengthens grip
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was exactly as described. Just what I was looking for to treat tennis elbow. The color is sharp and the resistance is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Retrouser

customer_reviews.title: Stress, No mess
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a stress ball. It's one the few stress balls that can not break.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Jeska

customer_reviews.title: Good for hand pain
customer_reviews.text: These balls are very helpful for people with arthritis pain and/or carpal tunnel syndrome. After trying the first one and liking it, I ordered some extra balls so we could keep one in the car and a couple more in the house. The exercise instructions are useful.
customer_reviews.author: leafycritter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight and firmness.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought one for both my office and home use. This is a bit smaller than my usual stress ball, but has a really good weight and perfect firmness. It feels very sturdy unlike the sand variety which are great until the burst and explode sand all over your office.
customer_reviews.author: Stringweez

customer_reviews.title: gift for my mother
customer_reviews.text: she has horrible issues with her hands cramping up and this thing does the trick with helping her everytime they start acting up. she takes it everywhere with her and makes sure she has it next to her before she goes to sleep. perfect perfect perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Wayy to small. Smaller than a 4 year olds palm. to small so to tough to squeeze
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It is an accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is exactly what I expected and its description is accurate....I myself am not allowed to use them yet, but my doctor said soon and these are perfect. My hand size is very small and they even fit my hand and my husband’s hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for therapy when healing a broken hand !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stress ball as I am recovering from two broken bones in my hand and figured it was a good recovery aid. At first I thought the ball was way too small but after 2 days use I love it. I use it almost constantly and my hand is already showing great signs of returning to normal use. I love this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Graham King

customer_reviews.title: Works great but needs to be a bit softer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a lot since it arrived. My only complaint is that I wish it was a bit softer and squishier as it was described. It does help me with my stress still and would recommend. It is high quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Squeezy ball for hand exercises
customer_reviews.text: Green squishy squeeze ball for hand exercises. I got this for physical therapy exercises. Soft and flexible. Nothing solid in there at all, as far as I can tell. Great for something to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great exerciser
customer_reviews.text: The Serenilite Stress Ball is great for doing hand exercises. I suffer from cramping of the fingers & hand and the ball has decreased the number of times this cramping occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Its Shape and Firmness
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best stress ball I've ever had. I waited 7 months to write a review because every other stress ball I've had became useless in a few months – either lost its shape, or became too soft, or fell apart in some way. But this one has held up GREAT. Same shape, same firmness, stitching all intact. I work in software, sitting at a desk for 8 hours a day, and am very fidgety, so I've reached for this stress ball an awful lot in the last 7 months. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: janda

customer_reviews.title: Great rehab tool
customer_reviews.text: The ball fits perfectly in my hand. It is easy to squeeze but offers some resistance as well so it's not squishy like the childrens plastic toys. Very comfortable weight and shape too. The one I got looks to be well made and I'm extremely satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: stress ball
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price. And also received a download of exercises at no charge. Thanks I would definetely order from Serenilite again. Great company to do buisiness with! Its great that they give a free download with how to use the stress ball. FREE! Love it, not too many things are free.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Squiccirini

customer_reviews.title: This product works in every day or stress full day ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works in every day or stress full day from work to personal life or just a tough day!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Having a job that can be super stressful, I decided to get a stress ball ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a job that can be super stressful, I decided to get a stress ball since I squeezed a small orange to the point if destruction last week. Love this stress ball. It seems to be very durable and easier to squeeze than my co-workers neck. 😄
customer_reviews.author: River Dog

customer_reviews.title: This super cute stress ball is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've used enough foam stress balls in the past to know that a heart shape works well for my hands. I was delighted to find this one! It's got a just-right perfect level of firmness, it seems well made, and, as a bonus, it's super cute and comes in my favorite color. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for donating platelets
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a squeezer while donating platelets at the American Red Cross. You must squeeze something every 15 seconds or so from the supply arm and this works great. A donation takes about 2 hours so there is a lot of squeezing and the Serenilite Stress Ball feels great and works well,
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Price

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for Arthritis sufferers
customer_reviews.text: The balls arrived one day earlier than predicted. I started exercising at once and see a notable difference. So happy with my purchase. I recommend this to any person suffering from Rheumatoid Arthritis. Sincerely, Fusun D. Charles
customer_reviews.author: Fusun D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great but the product is not practical. The material is too hard to press on constantly, like I would when I am stressed out.
customer_reviews.author: Mikesamazon

customer_reviews.title: coming undone
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. .ive had so much trouble finding a stress ball that won't fall apart on me. This one held up for a little over a week then appeared to be coming apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Good size, nice material, retains shape
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 14 y/o son... he asked for one on the recommendation of his father as part of some sort of exercise regimen. He seems pretty pleased with it. He likes the way it feels, fits perfectly in his hands, and it’s aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Work's great for rehabilitation
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on my left hand, and the squeeze ball worked great for helping me get strength and mobility back in my hand..
customer_reviews.author: 7240 puller

customer_reviews.title: I really like the feel of this stress ball
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of this stress ball. The material on the outside is smooth and squishes nicely with a gel-like consistency. It seems very durable and well made. Very glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Chapman

customer_reviews.title: VERY high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great stress relievers. They are very sturdy and will definitely build have strength. The bundle was great so everyone could have their own. Perfect for stress and anxiety and ADHD.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pesto

customer_reviews.title: Feels good to use
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if I could remember to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great little exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture for squeezing, cover seems durable. Good sized ball for hand strengthening exercises. I wanted one that didn't have a sticky outer feel, this one fit the bill with a knit outer cover.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just right stress ball.
customer_reviews.text: This stress ball is better than all others I’ve had in that the size & firmness are just right and the sewn on synthetic cover actually feels better than plain rubber. Previous uncovered ones had a tendency to stick to some surfaces. Time will tell if it’s easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Music is good for you

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Good Stress Reliever.
customer_reviews.text: I catch myself reaching in my purse for this ball all the time and squeezing it to relieve stress. It's very well made. Not too soft but more on the firm side.
customer_reviews.author: Phloxy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The Serenilite Hand Therapy Stress Ball is probably 10x more useful than a fidget spinner for most people. The outside feels like one of those microfiber cloths that you would clean your glasses with, and center is a gel substance. Has just the right amount of give. It's slightly bouncy, so i bounce it on my desk while i'm thinking. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: NosMike

customer_reviews.title: Good to help strengthen hands
customer_reviews.text: Item is good size for my hand and I have small hands. Substance inside is a good consistency. Firm enough to exercise my hand and not overly firm where it is hard to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: This was actually a gift for a friend. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift for a friend. I heard back, though, that he's loving it! I forwarded the exercise instruction booklet included via email, so hopefully he'll get even more use out of it than only squeezing his stress out.
customer_reviews.author: Tami L. Osterday

product_meta.title: Serenilite Hand Therapy Stress Ball - Optimal Stress Relief - Great for Hand Exercises and Strengthening
feature_bullets: RELIEVE YOUR STRESS ANXIETY hand therapy stress balls for reducing physical discomfort and relieving mental tension. Every squeeze will improve focus, increase strength, and soothe the mind. Relax your mind and body with your new stress ball.
STRENGTHEN YOUR GRIP, JOINTS & MUSCLES while reducing carpal tunnel & arthritis symptoms while relieving stress. Increase blood flow and circulation

ULTRA-DURABLE & PREMIUM QUALITY ergonomic stress relief ball made of a tear-resistant gel core and sleek non-stick fabric. Experience maximum grip & comfort. Retains shape & smooth to the touch. We’ve custom made our stress ball to fit your needs.
SPARK MULTIPLE SENSES by physical therapy and color therapy, improving well-being and relaxing your mind and body. Increase hand mobility & grip strength.

Lifetime & Happiness Guaranteed! - Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you have questions or concerns regarding your stress ball, please message us through Amazon and we'll try our best to assist you!
